description:
FREE iSocialize+: the BEST and ONLY app for Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Google+! Get the full version for more fun!
Not so many app have been in the Top 25 Social for over 3 years, with ☆☆☆☆☆ ratings, regular updates and new features: you can trust we won't let you down!

✓ Conveniently switch between Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and Tumblr from a single place
✓ Share anything everywhere with just ONE tap: status, YouTube videos, music, famous quotes, fun facts, jokes, animations, virtual gifts, any image from the web, news, your pictures and videos.
✓ Get friends birthdays' notifications and automatically send your best wishes with virtual gifts or birthday videos, images, text!
✓ Post on your Facebook Wall, friend's Wall, Groups, your Pages, Twitter, Tumblr and e-mail... with just ONE tap!
✓ Edit your pictures with amazing filters and effects; add tags and captions; post videos and multiple pictures in one shot!
✓ Full intuitive privacy for Facebook to control who will see your posts, multitasking support to come back where you left off, landscape mode for fastest typing.

NEW and UNIQUE feature!!! Update your Facebook status with your VOICE!

☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆

                            iSocialize+
Featured by Apple in *All-Time* Top Paid apps AND Top 10 best Social Networking app for 2010!

☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆

☆ Complete Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and Tumblr apps
Switch from Facebook to Twitter to Google+ to Tumblr to follow and interact with your social networks.

☆ Animated Emoticons
Have fun sharing emoticons ANIMATING on your screen.

☆ Symbols + dılɟ + ⓢⓣ㋡ⓛⓔⓢ
IMPRΣSS ⓐⓝⓓ ՏմɾԹɾíՏҽ your friends with the largest selection of symbols ❤☺✌☀☼☁☂☾✓✗✂☆∞❢✈✆☎☊♪♫✍☮ and styles: ʇxǝʇ uʍop-ǝpısdn ɥʇıʍ spuǝıɹɟ ɹnoʎ ǝsıɹdɹnS.

☆ Quotes
Over 65 years of daily inspiring quotes to get tons of Likes.

☆ Image Search
Search the web for the right image to go with your post: a city landscape to send as a postcard, that actor/actress you love or just any image you can find on the web!

☆ YouTube Share
Search, preview and post YouTube videos: a music video, an "Happy Birthday" song, a movie trailer, your videos.

☆ Music Share
Share the music you are listening to. Watch music videos from YouTube of songs you are playing. Check Top 50 charts for Music Singles, Album and Videos from iTunes to get the latest hits. Get new songs with a tap.

☆ Virtual Gifts
The most beautiful Collection of Virtual Gifts to make your posts more colorful, fun and entertaining! Over 1,000 amazingly breathtaking images and realistic icons organized in categories (Flowers, Kisses, Girls, Guys, Drinks, Animals, Balloons) or events (Birthday, Love, Friendship, Wedding, Baby Born, Celebration and any Holidays)

☆ Birthdays notifications
Never miss again your Facebook friends' birthdays and send a beautiful gift from the Collection to celebrate it!

☆ REAL 4x6 cards to family and friends! Birthday, Love, Holidays but also your own pictures PRINTED & SHIPPED from the app!

☆ Jokes
Enjoy the funniest jokes, facts, statuses and share them with your friends!

☆ News
Check the latest news and share them: Entertainment, Sport, Business, World, Science, Health and more.

☆ Your Pictures and Videos
Take a picture or a video with your iPhone camera or pick an existing one to share it.
